message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I really like the product, but I have a limited budget. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you have a limited budget, Bob, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $12000. I'm willing to compromise, though. How about we meet at $18000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $18000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make another compromise. How about we meet at $16000? It's a bit more than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14500. Can you meet me at this price?
